CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Leave_Entitlement_Type_Config__r.Leave_Type__c, 'Annual Leave') , 'Annual Leave', IF( ISPICKVAL(Leave_Entitlement_Type_Config__r.Leave_Type__c, 'Sick Leave') , 'Sick Leave', IF( ISPICKVAL(Leave_Entitlement_Type_Config__r.Leave_Type__c, 'Maternity Leave') , 'Maternity Leave', IF( ISPICKVAL(Leave_Entitlement_Type_Config__r.Leave_Type__c, 'Paternity Leave') , 'Paternity Leave', IF( ISPICKVAL(Leave_Entitlement_Type_Config__r.Leave_Type__c, 'Exam Leave') , 'Exam Leave', IF( ISPICKVAL(Leave_Entitlement_Type_Config__r.Leave_Type__c, 'Compassionate Leave') , 'Compassionate Leave', NULL))))))
CustomField.label: Leave Type
